addon.name: Mednafen PC Engine (Fast)@arch@
addon.extension:
Mednafen v0.9.28 PC Engine / TurboGrafx 16 / SuperGrafx Mednafen is a portable multi-system emulator. The "pce_fast" Mednafen emulation module is an experimental alternative to the pce emulation module, modified for speed at the expense of (usually) unneeded accuracy.
Supported files: @supported_files@
Source: https://github.com/libretro/mednafen-libretro @platform@ true true @broken@
